headline: Cencora Closes $1.8 Billion Senior Notes Offering
summary: CONSHOHOCKEN, Pa., December 09, 2024--Cencora, Inc. (NYSE: COR) today announced the closing of its public offering of $500,000,000 aggregate principal amount of its 4.625% Senior Notes due December 15, 2027 (the "2027 Notes"), $600,000,000 aggregate principal amount of its 4.850% Senior Notes due December 15, 2029 (the "2029 Notes") and $700,000,000 aggregate principal amount of its 5.150% Senior Notes due February 15, 2035 (the "2035 Notes" and, together with the 2027 Notes and the 2029 Notes,
